T02D2238:114a-1: nir bhe da panytsa ka / bod skad du /
T02D2238:114a-4: sangs rgyas rtogs na 'gro ba dag / sangs rgyas
T02D2238:114a-5: rtogs pa can rtsa lag / ae ma'o sangs rgyas
T02D2238:114a-6: gzod nas dag / sangs rgyas bstan pa ji ltar
T02D2238:114a-7: rtogs // 'dis ni gnyen po dang de kho na nyid dang /
T02D2238:114a-8: 'bras bu la rnam par rtog pa bzlog pa ni /
T02D2238:114a-9: rang bzhin gyis dbyer med pa can te /
T02D2238:114a-11: ye shes rnyog med stong pa ste //
T02D2238:114a-12: lhun grub snying rje'i bdag nyid can //
T02D2238:114a-13: de yang rkyen las skyes pa ste //
T02D2238:114a-14: dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs //
T02D2238:114a-15: 'dir ni dbyer med rtogs pa'i rang bzhin bstan pa'o //
T02D2238:114a-16: chos rnams stong pa ya mtshan che //
T02D2238:114a-17: snying rje shin tu ngo mtshar che //
T02D2238:114a-18: 'khor lo sdom pa'i nus pa mtshar //
T02D2238:114a-19: kun rdzob dag pa shin tu mtshar /
T02D2238:114a-20: 'dis ni shin tu dbyer med pa lhan cig skyes pa'i mthu bshad pa'o //
T02D2238:114a-21: ha ci brjod pa ji ltar bshad //
T02D2238:114a-22: bshad na skye bo su yis go //
T02D2238:114a-23: rtogs par gyur na mi 'gyur nyid //
T02D2238:114a-24: lhun gyis grub pa nyid du snang //
T02D2238:114a-25: 'dis ni snying rjes rab tu mi gnas pa'i chos
T02D2238:114a-26: zab mo'i tshul la mos pa'i skyes bu rnyed pa
T02D2238:114a-27: dka' bar bstan pa nyid do //
T02D2238:114a-28: rang gi las kyi sa bon sku //
T02D2238:114a-29: gnad gcod pa yi 'bras bu gang//
T02D2238:114b-0: @114b bdag gis gzhan la mi gtse ste //
T02D2238:114b-1: ae ma'o de nyid kyis ni bzod //
T02D2238:114b-2: 'dis ni rang gi las kyi skud pa'i mdud pas
T02D2238:114b-3: dkris pa'i blo dang ldan pa'i sems can thams cad
T02D2238:114b-4: byang chub sems dpa' yongs su 'dzin par byed cing
T02D2238:114b-6: mi phyed pa lnga pa slob dpon mee tri bas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2238:114b-8: // / rgya gar gyi mkhan po badzra p'a ni dang /
